gaffer.operation.simple.hdfs

Class MapReduceOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaffer.operation.AbstractOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
      • gaffer.operation.simple.hdfs.MapReduceOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddElementsFromHdfs, SampleDataForSplitPoints

    public abstract class MapReduceOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
extends AbstractOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    The MapReduceOperation operation is the base operation that should be extended for any Operations that run map reduce jobs. JobInitialiser.

    For normal operation handlers the operation View will be ignored.

    NOTE - currently this job has to be run as a hadoop job.
    See Also:
    MapReduceOperation.Builder
